descriptionHtml:
There are already console command to disable health regeneration. But it works only until the game is restarted. To disable this regeneration permanently you should use .modav instead of .setav. But .modav cammand works a bit differently. You also should use a negative value there.

So this is what you need to type in the console:
player.modav healrate -0.7

Just save after this and say goodbye to regeneration. 

;)
author: Liz00n
